body.p:
Barbourville Ky
Sept 29th 1863
Gov Bramlette
My Dear Sir

It will gratify me very much if you will remit the fine of two hundred dollars against C. C. Webb. The Petitioner will give you all the facts in the case. I think that it will be a great benefit to him,- and he will not be caught again. Pardon this offense and he will not ask you any more.

Truly your friend
J. W. Anderson

P. S. If you will remit the fine I will take it as an especial favor to me
J. W. A
